name: My Cousins House Demo Version
description:
Overview

A young boy searches for his real parents after 15 years of adoption.

A young 18-year-old boy stays in his current home while searching for his real parents, the young boy discovered the adoption

relationship he had with his fake parents. He continues with his mission after discovering he was missing a long time ago

Title: My Cousins House

Developer: MrDikGames

Developer website: Patreon Itch.io

Language: English

Version: Demo
